TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataPointCollection extends System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementCollection`1<class System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint>
Public Class DataPointCollection Inherits ChartElementCollection(Of DataPoint)

summary.span: 表示 对象集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示对象的集合 ，这些对象又表示属于对象的数据点 。The class represents a collection of objects, which in turn represent the data points that are part of a object. 此集合类作为 对象的属性实现 。This collection class is implemented as the property of a object. 对象可以追加或插入到集合中，其 X 值和 Y 值 (s) 已指定为参数。 objects can be appended or inserted into the collection with their X-value and Y-value(s) already specified as parameters. 请注意，当使用或方法将系列绑定到数据源时，也会自动添加 它们 。Note that they are also added automatically when a series is bound to a data source using either the or method. 仅当集合所属的序列的 属性设置为 `true` (默认值为 `false`) 时，或者所有数据点的所有 X 值都为零时，才会按其在此集合中出现的顺序绘制数据点。Data points are plotted in the order that they occur in this collection only if the series that the collection belongs to has its property set to `true` (the default value is `false`), or if all X-values for all data points are zero. 否则，将使用其 X 值绘制数据点。Otherwise data points are plotted using their X-values. 可以分别使用重载的或方法，查找数据点并根据最小值、最小值或指定的 X 或 Y 值进行操作 `FindMaxValue` `FindMinValue` `FindValue` 。Data points can be located, and manipulated, based on maximum, minimum or specified X or Y-values using the overloaded `FindMaxValue`, `FindMinValue` or `FindValue` methods, respectively. 属性指示集合中的总项数，通常用于查找集合的上限。The property indicates the total number of items in the collection and is commonly used to find the upper bound of the collection.

span.span: Adds a new object to the collection and sets its Y value.
The newly added object.

span.span: Adds a object to the end of the collection, with the specified X-value and Y-value.

span.span: Adds a object to the end of the collection, with the specified X-value and Y-value.

returns.span: 一个 ，表示数据点集合中项插入处的零始索引。

span.span: An that represents the zero-based index where the item was inserted into the data point collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将 对象添加到 ; 始终将对象添加到集合的末尾。This method adds object to the ; the object is always added to the end of the collection. 如果数据点需要多个 Y 值，请使用方法重载。Use the method overload if your data points require more than one Y-value. 如果数据点不需要 X 值（即，如果要创建非散点图），请改用 方法。If your data points do not need an X-value - that is, if you are creating non-scatter plots - use the method instead.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将一个 对象添加到 ; 数据点总是添加到集合的末尾。This method adds one object to the ; the data point is always added to the end of the collection. 必须提供至少一个 (1) Y 值，否则将引发异常。You must provide at least one (1) Y-value, otherwise an exception will be thrown. 此方法还检查 此数据所属对象的属性; 如果指定的 Y 值太多，将引发异常。This method also checks the property of the object that this data belongs to; if too many Y-values are specified, an exception will be thrown. 为了使 格式设置生效，值必须为 对象。In order for formatting to have an effect, a value must be a object. 如果数据点不需要 X 值（即，如果要创建非散点图），请改用 方法If your data points do not need an X-value - that is, if you are creating non-scatter plots - use the method instead

span.span: Adds a object to the end of the collection, with the specified Y-value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将一个 对象添加到 ; 数据点总是添加到集合的末尾。This method adds one object to the ; the data point is always added to the end of the collection. 必须提供至少一个 (1) Y 值，否则将引发异常。You must provide at least one (1) Y-value, otherwise an exception will be thrown. 此方法还检查 此数据所属对象的属性; 如果指定的 Y 值太多，将引发异常。This method also checks the property of the object this data belongs to; if too many Y-values are specified, an exception will be thrown. X 值将始终设置为零 (0) ，导致产生非散点图。The X-value will always be set to zero (0), resulting in non-scatter plots. 如果希望数据点使用 X 值，请改为调用 `AddXY` 方法之一。If you want the data points to use an X-value, call one of the `AddXY` methods instead. 为了使 格式设置生效，值必须为 对象。In order for formatting to have an effect, a value must be a object. 有关可用于对象类型参数的有效 .NET Framework 类型的完整列表，请参阅以下内容：Refer to the following for a complete listing of valid .NET Framework types that can be used for the object type parameters: |||| |-|-|-| |字符串String|DateTimeDateTime|DoubleDouble| |小数Decimal|SingleSingle|Int32Int32| |UInt32UInt32|Int64Int64|UInt64UInt64|

summary.span: 将数据点的 X 值、Y 值和属性值（如 Tooltip 或 LabelStyle）绑定到数据源的数据。

span.span: Data binds the X-value, Y-value(s) and property values of the data points, such as Tooltip or LabelStyle, to the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据源可以是 Ole (SQL) DataReader，DataView，DataSet，DataTable 或 DataRow。The data source can be the Ole(SQL)DataReader, DataView, DataSet, DataTable or DataRow.

summary.span: 将集合中数据点的 X 值和 Y 值绑定到指定数据源的指定列的数据。

span.span: Data binds the X-value and Y-values of the data points in the collection to the specified columns of the specified data sources.

MemberSignature.Value: public void DataBindXY (System.Collections.IEnumerable xValue, params System.Collections.IEnumerable[] yValues);

member this.DataBindXY : System.Collections.IEnumerable * System.Collections.IEnumerable[] -> unit

param.name: xValue
param.span: 将为数据点提供 X 值的数据源。

span.span: The data source that will supply the X-values for the data points.

param.name: yValues
param.span: 添加到集合的 对象的 Y 值的逗号分隔列表。

span.span: A comma-separated list of the Y-value(s) of the object added to the collection.

summary.span: 将集合数据点的 X 值和 Y 值绑定到指定数据源第一列的数据。

span.span: Data binds the X-value and Y-values of the collection's data points to the first columns of the specified data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法绑定 中的所有对象 ，并为 X 和 Y 值 (s) 使用不同的数据源。This method binds all objects in a , and uses separate data sources for the X and Y-value(s). 请注意，如果数据绑定到表，将使用数据源中的第一个可用列。Note that the first available column in the data source will be used if data-binding to a table. 若要绑定到第一列之外的列，请使用 方法。To bind to a column other than the first column, use the method. 可以通过为参数提供以逗号分隔的对象列表，来绑定到多个 Y 值 `yValues` 。You can bind to multiple Y-values by providing a comma-separated list of objects for the `yValues` parameter. 如果数据源未提供 Y 值，或者如果提供的值的数目不正确，则将引发异常。If Y-values are not provided by the data source, or if the wrong number of values are provided, an exception will be thrown. 如果不想显示同时使用 X 和 Y 值的散点图类型图形，请改用其中一种 `DataBindY` 方法。If you do not want to display scatter-type plots, in which both X and Y-values are used, use one of the `DataBindY` methods instead. 下面列出了可以用作数据源参数的对象：The following is a list of objects that you can use as the data source parameter: - DataViewDataView - 数据读取器 (SQL、OleDB) Data readers (SQL, OleDB) - 数组Arrays - 列表Lists - 使用接口的所有其他对象 。All other objects that use the interface.

member this.DataBindXY : System.Collections.IEnumerable * string * System.Collections.IEnumerable * string -> unit

param.name: xValue
param.span: 将为数据点提供 X 值的数据源。

span.span: The data source that will supply the X-values for the data points.

param.name: xField
param.span: 将为数据点提供 X 值的列的名称。

span.span: The name of the column that will supply the X-values for the data points.

param.name: yValue
param.span: 添加到集合的 对象的 Y 值的逗号分隔列表。

span.span: A comma-separated list of the Y-value(s) of the object added to the collection.

param.name: yFields
param.span: 一个逗号分隔列表，其中列出了将应用数据点的 Y 值的列名称。

span.span: A comma-separated list of column name(s) that will supply the Y-values for the data points.

param.span: 请注意，若要在列名称中嵌入逗号，可以使用双逗号。

span.span: Note that a comma can be embedded as part of a column name, by using a double comma.

summary.span: 将集合中数据点的 X 值和 Y 值绑定到指定数据源的指定列的数据。

span.span: Data binds the X-value and Y-values of the data points in the collection to the specified columns of the specified data sources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据将集合中数据点的 X 值和 Y 值绑定到指定数据源的第一列。Data binds the X-value and Y-values of the data points in the collection to the specified data source's first columns. 可以通过将 `yFields` 参数设置为多个列名来绑定到多个 Y 值。You can bind to several Y-values by setting the `yFields` parameter to multiple column names. 用逗号分隔列名称。Separate the column names with commas. 如果数据源未提供 Y 值，或者如果提供的值的数目不正确，则将引发异常。If Y-values are not provided by the data source, or if the wrong number of values are provided, an exception will be thrown. 如果不想显示同时使用 X 和 Y 值的散点图类型图形，请改用其中一种 `DataBindY` 方法。If you do not want to display scatter-type plots, in which both X and Y-values are used, use one of the `DataBindY` methods instead. 下面列出了可以用作数据源参数的对象：The following is a list of objects that you can use as the data source parameter: - DataViewDataView - 数据读取器 (SQL、OleDB) Data readers (SQL, OleDB) - 数组Arrays - 列表Lists - 使用接口的所有其他对象 。All other objects that use the interface.

summary.span: 将数据点的 Y 值绑定到指定数据源的指定列的数据。

span.span: Data binds the Y-value(s) of the data points to the specified column(s) of the specified data source.

summary.span: 将集合数据点的 Y 值绑定到指定数据源第一列的数据。

span.span: Data binds the Y-value(s) of the collection's data points to the first column of the specified data source(s).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将集合中数据点的 Y 值 (s) 绑定到指定数据源 () 的第一列。This method binds the Y-value(s) of the data points in the collection to the first column of the specified data source(s). 若要将 Y 值绑定到不是第一个可用列的数据源列，请使用 方法。To bind Y-values to a data source column that is not the first available column, use the method. 可以通过使用参数指定多个数据源来绑定多个 Y 值 `yValue` 。You can bind several Y-values by specifying multiple data sources, using the `yValue` parameter. 请注意，每个数据源中的第一个可用列将用于每个数据点的连续 Y 值。Note that the first available column in each data source will be used for each data point's successive Y-values. 例如，第一个数据源的第一列 将绑定到数据点的第一个 y 值，第二个数据源的第一列 将绑定到数据点的第二个 y 值等。For example, the first column of the first data source will be bound to the first Y-value of data points, the first column of the second data source will be bound to the second Y-value of data points, and so forth. 如果数据源未提供 Y 值，或者如果提供的值的数目不正确，则将引发异常。If Y-values are not provided by the data source, or if the wrong number of values are provided, an exception will be thrown. 下面列出了可以用作数据源参数的对象：The following is a list of objects that you can use as the data source parameter: 下面列出了可以用作数据源的对象：The following is a list of objects that you can use as the data source: - DataViewDataView - 数据读取器 (SQL、OleDB) Data readers (SQL, OleDB) - 数组Arrays - 列表Lists - 使用接口的所有其他对象 。All other objects that use the interface.

[<System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

span.span: An data source object that provides the Y-value(s).

span.span: The data source field(s) to which to bind data point(s).

param.span: 请注意，若要在列名称中嵌入逗号，可以使用双逗号。

summary.span: 将数据点的 Y 值绑定到指定数据源的指定列的数据。

span.span: Data binds the Y-value(s) of the data points to the specified column(s) of the specified data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将集合中的数据点的 Y 值绑定到数据源 (s) 的指定字段。This method binds the Y-values of the data points in the collection to the specified fields(s) of the data source. 若要仅绑定到数据源中的第一个字段，请使用 方法。To bind only to the first field in a data source, use the method. 可以通过将 `yFields` 参数设置为多个以逗号分隔的字段名称来绑定到多个字段。You can bind to several fields by setting the `yFields` parameter to multiple field names that are comma-separated. 请注意，第一个字段将用于数据点的第一个 Y 值，第二个命名字段将用于数据点的第二个 Y 值等。Note that the first field will be used for the data point's first Y-value, the second named field will be used for the data point's second Y-value, and so forth. 如果数据源未提供 Y 值，或提供的值的数目不正确，则将引发异常。If Y-values are not provided by the data source, or the wrong number of values are provided, an exception will be thrown. 下面列出了可以用作数据源的对象：The following is a list of objects that you can use as the data source: - DataViewDataView - 数据读取器 (SQL、OleDB) Data readers (SQL, OleDB) - 数组Arrays - 列表Lists - 使用接口的所有其他对象 。All other objects that use the interface.

summary.span: 查找等于指定值的所有数据点。

span.span: Finds all the data points that are equal to the specified value.
